channel.title: Wayne County Office of Emergency Management | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/WayneCoWVOEM/

item.title: **BOIL WATER ADVISORY LIFTED** 1000-1300 BLOCK OF BEECH AND
item.description: **BOIL WATER ADVISORY LIFTED** 1000-1300 BLOCK OF BEECH AND WALNUT STREET* *See below for details*

item.title: WENS Alert: A HEAT ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO
item.description: WENS Alert: A HEAT ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING Go to https://www.smart911.com/smart911/ref/reg.action?pa=WENS to register for more focused alerts, such as localized flooding.

item.title: The heat index will be 100+ degrees today. There is a mentio
item.description: The heat index will be 100+ degrees today. There is a mention of rain, but that will probably happen to our north.
